resources.string: Another installed app is already configured for GitHub authentication.\n\nYou must remove the other app from the Accounts & sync settings and uninstall it before the GitHub app can be used.
New to GitHub? Click here to sign up
Add metadata tags to each article. These can be used as attributes within GH-Pages.
Add your tag as a key:value

You can choose how to save the article. Saving as draft will commit the post to your GH-Pages repository, but in the _drafts folder. Save to live will make the article available on your main GH-Pages site.
Are you sure you want to delete this article?
Enter the title of your new site. Note: there is no need to add the GH-Pages domain (e.g github.io) as this will be added automatically.

This app was created to make it quick and easy to write articles while on the move. 
As Hubblog only publishes to GitHub Pages, there is a restriction on writing articles in either Markdown or plain text. 

Hubblog is in no way affiliated with GitHub and just connects to their fantastic service. 

If you like using this app and would like to donate, that would be much appreciated! The donate button below will open PayPal in a new browser window:
This app is open source. You can view all of the latest code at the GitHub repository by clicking on the button below. Again, it will open in a new browser window.
In order to properly use Hubblog, details of your GitHub account need to be provided. You can change them at any time via the settings menu.
